activities.name: Gateway of India
activities.description: Visit the iconic Gateway of India, a historical monument overlooking the Arabian Sea. Take a ferry to Elephanta Island.

activities.name: Elephanta Caves
activities.description: Explore the ancient rock-cut Elephanta Caves, a UNESCO World Heritage Site dedicated to Lord Shiva.

recommendations.name: Street Food at Girgaum Chowpatty
recommendations.description: Enjoy local Mumbai street food like Pav Bhaji, Vada Pav, and Pani Puri. Vegetarian options available.

accommodation.recommendation: Consider hotels in Colaba or Fort area to be near the Gateway of India and other attractions. Check for options within your budget on booking websites. Examples: Hotel Sea Princess, The Taj Mahal Tower Mumbai (luxury)

activities.name: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus (CST)
activities.description: Visit the historic railway station, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Admire the Victorian Gothic architecture.

activities.name: Dhobi Ghat
activities.description: Witness the open-air laundry at Dhobi Ghat, where clothes are washed and dried in a traditional way.

activities.name: Mani Bhavan Gandhi Museum
activities.description: Visit the former residence of Mahatma Gandhi, now a museum showcasing his life and work.

recommendations.name: Britannia & Co.
recommendations.description: Enjoy Parsi cuisine at this iconic restaurant. Try the Berry Pulav.

accommodation.recommendation: Continue staying at the same hotel or explore other options in the city.

activities.name: Travel from Mumbai to Lonavala
activities.description: Take a train or hire a car to Lonavala (approx. 2-3 hours).

activities.name: Bhaja Caves
activities.description: Explore the ancient Buddhist caves at Bhaja, known for their intricate carvings.

activities.name: Lonavala Lake
activities.description: Relax by the serene Lonavala Lake and enjoy the scenic views.

recommendations.name: Local Restaurants in Lonavala
recommendations.description: Try local Maharashtrian cuisine. Misal Pav is a must-try.

accommodation.recommendation: Find budget-friendly hotels or guesthouses in Lonavala.

activities.name: Karla Caves
activities.description: Visit the Karla Caves, one of the largest and best-preserved Buddhist cave temples in India.

activities.name: Tiger Point
activities.description: Enjoy panoramic views of the surrounding hills and valleys from Tiger Point.

recommendations.name: Maggi Point near Tiger Point
recommendations.description: Enjoy Maggi and tea with a view.

activities.name: Shopping at Colaba Causeway
activities.description: Shop for souvenirs, clothes, and accessories at Colaba Causeway.

activities.name: Relax and Depart
activities.description: Relax in the evening before departing from Mumbai.

recommendations.name: Leopold Cafe
recommendations.description: Enjoy a meal at this iconic cafe.

weather_suggestion: May in Maharashtra is generally hot. Pack light cotton clothes and stay hydrated. Given the heat, consider visiting attractions during the cooler parts of the day (early morning or late afternoon).
local_events: Check local listings for any events or festivals happening during your travel dates.
